description:
This routine is to be used with the open source package for seismic wave propagation
SPECFEM3D_Globe version v7.0.2-111-gf469578
(https://geodynamics.org/cig/software/specfem3d_globe/) to implement the LLNL S-, P-, Rayleigh, Love wave model (SPiRaL). It handles 3D radial isotropic crustal and mantle properties, as well as 410-660 topography.
name: LLNL S-, P-, Rayleigh, Love wave model implementation into SPECFEM3D_Globe
